B

balance - Variable in class account.Account
The dollar balance on the account.
bankmanager - package bankmanager
Provides the classes necessary to handle user and atm requests that require high-level authorization.
BankManager - Class in bankmanager
The Bank Manager class can fulfill requests submitted through the ATM that the ATM cannot perform by either doing them or delegating them to one of 3 other responsible managers: AccountManager, TransactionManager, and UserManager.
BankManager(ATM) - Constructor for class bankmanager.BankManager
Bank Manager constructor.
BankManagerInterface - Class in interfaces
A class representing the bank manager menu that will be displayed in the interface for bank managers to perform the required tasks: set date, create user, create account, check alerts, restock machine, undo transactions for users, shut down the system.
BankManagerInterface(ATM) - Constructor for class interfaces.BankManagerInterface
Constructor for the BankManagerInterface.
bankManagerInterface - Variable in class interfaces.Interface
The bank manager interface that the bank manager will see.
BankMutualFundBroker - Class in broker
Class for a mutual fund broker who deals with buying and selling mutual funds for the bank/ATM.
BankMutualFundBroker(ATM) - Constructor for class broker.BankMutualFundBroker
Constructor for BankMutualFundBroker.
bankMutualFundBroker - Variable in class broker.MutualFundsBroker
 
bankMutualFundBroker - Variable in class broker.UserMutualFundBroker
The bank mutual fund broker.
basicSubscriptions() - Method in class subscriptions.AvailableSubscriptions
Adds some basic subscriptions to AvailableSubscriptions.listOfSubscriptions
billPayee - Variable in class atm.Transaction
The name of the external account to whom a bill is being paid to.
bills - Variable in class atm.ATM
Stores the total amount of the bills in the ATM in an array with the following order: [5 dollar bills, 10, dollar bills, 20 dollar bills, 50 dollar bills].
Bills - Class in atm
Bills represents the bills in the ATM machine.
Bills(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class atm.Bills
Bills constructor.
bills - Variable in class atm.Bills
A list that stores the number of each type of bill available in the ATM.
BM - Variable in class atm.ATM
The Bank Manager.
broker - package broker
This package represents a stock broker who handles the buying and selling of stocks.
broker - Variable in class atm.ATM
The Broker responsible for investments.
Broker - Class in broker
Broker is a class that creates a new Broker for the ATM.
Broker(ATM, BankManager) - Constructor for class broker.Broker
 
broker - Variable in class broker.MutualFundsBroker
 
BrokerInterface - Class in interfaces
Class representing the broker menu that will be displayed in the interface for broker to be able to buy and sell mutual funds for the ATM.
BrokerInterface(ATM) - Constructor for class interfaces.BrokerInterface
Constructor for BrokerInterface
brokerInterface - Variable in class interfaces.Interface
The broker interface that the broker will see.
buyFunds() - Method in class interfaces.BrokerInterface
Allows the broker to buy funds for the ATM.
buyMutualFunds(User, MutualFund, double) - Method in class broker.MutualFundsBroker
Used to access UserMutualFundBroker.buyMutualFunds(User, MutualFund, double) by the interface.
buyMutualFunds(User, MutualFund, double) - Method in class broker.UserMutualFundBroker
Allows a user to invest/buy into a mutual fund.
buyMutualFunds(User) - Method in class interfaces.InvestmentInterface
Allows the user to buy mutual funds.
buyNewStock(String, int, Account, InvestmentPortfolio) - Method in class broker.StockBroker
Helper function to buyStocks(), purchases a stock not already owned by User.
buyOwnedStock(String, int, Account, InvestmentPortfolio) - Method in class broker.StockBroker
Buys stocks of given share amount for a user (if the user already owns some shares of it)
buyStockBank(MutualFund, String, int) - Method in class broker.BankMutualFundBroker
Allows the broker to buy a certain number of shares of a new stock for a mutual fund.
buyStocks(String, int, Account, InvestmentPortfolio) - Method in class broker.StockBroker
Buys stocks of given share amount for a user.
buyStocks(User) - Method in class interfaces.InvestmentInterface
Allows the user to buy stocks.
buyStocksFund(MutualFund, String, int) - Method in class broker.BankMutualFundBroker
Allows the broker to buy stocks into a specified mutual fund.
buyStocksFund(MutualFund, String, Integer) - Method in class broker.MutualFundsBroker
Used to access BankMutualFundBroker.buyStocksFund(MutualFund, String, int) by the interface.
